alert.note: Alert for Shelby (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 3:30AM CDT until June 14 at 4:15AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Shelby County in central Alabama... * Until 415 AM CDT. * At 329 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Brierfield Ironworks Park, or 8 miles west of Montevallo, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Alabaster, Calera, Montevallo, Wilton, University Of Montevallo, Shelby County Airport, American Village, Alabaster Veterans Park and Dogwood. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
